Ok, Benny, where is Recon? He can't be in three places at once.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@h...> wrote:
> A single transformer watched from the top of a cliff, waiting for a 
> challenger of any kind to come along and battle him, it was 
Recon. "If 
> anybody decides to attack, they had better have friends, otherwise 
it will 
> be over as soon as it starts," Recon said to himself.
